nodes.text: The Valahorn was a type of musical instrument that was similar in appearance and sound to a Kloo horn. It was discovered in 1 ABY by an archaeological team that was investigating the Massassi Temples on Yavin 4. Although its origin was unknown, they theorized that it had been taken to Yavin 4 during the Great Sith War.
The Valahorn featured in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies and was added to the game in early 2008. It could only be played by Master Entertainers.
